item.title: TikTok 在最高法院上诉前聘请前特朗普政府律师
item.description: TikTok 和它的中国所有者字节跳动（ByteDance）已经求助于美国最高法院的一位资深律师，准备请求大法官阻止一项可能在美国禁止这一流行短视频平台的法律。【原文：TikTok and its Chinese owner ByteDance have turned to a veteran U.S. Supreme Court lawyer as they prepare to ask the justices to block a law that could ban the popular short video platform in the United States.】

item.title: 美国平均汽油价格自 2021 年以来首次降至每加仑 3 美元以下
item.description: 本周一，美国汽油平均价格在三年多的时间里首次跌破每加仑 3 美元，使近年来面临通胀飙升的消费者在加油时享受到的低价优惠得以延续。【原文：Average U.S. gasoline prices fell below $3 a gallon for the first time in over three years on Monday, extending a run of bargains at the pump for consumers who have faced soaring inflation in recent years.】

item.title: Vanguard 计划成立新的咨询和财富管理部门
item.description: 货币管理公司先锋（Vanguard）周一表示，将成立一个新的咨询和财富管理部门，由业内资深人士乔安娜-罗滕伯格（Joanna Rotenberg）领导。【原文：Money manager Vanguard said on Monday it will establish a new advice and wealth management division led by industry veteran Joanna Rotenberg.】

item.title: 斯泰兰特前拉姆主管重返品牌运营岗位
item.description: 在首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）意外辞职后，这家汽车制造商正寻求加强其领导团队。【原文：Stellantis' former head of Ram is returning to the company just months after announcing his retirement, as the automaker seeks to strengthen its leadership team following the unexpected resignation of CEO Carlos Tavares.】

item.title: WARN 通知显示波音将在华盛顿州裁员近 400 人
item.description: 周一的一份工人调整和再培训通知显示，波音公司将在华盛顿州的多个地点裁员约 396 人。【原文：Boeing is laying off about 396 employees at various locations in Washington State, a worker adjustment and retraining notification showed on Monday.】

item.title: 债券义警 "PIMCO减持长期美国主权债务
item.description: PIMCO 周一表示，计划通过在美国以外地区买入政府债券来分散政府债券风险，由于美国财政状况恶化，PIMCO 看空美国长期国债前景。【原文：PIMCO said on Monday it plans to diversify its government bond exposure by buying outside the United States, where its outlook on long-term government debt is bearish due to a deteriorating fiscal profile.】

item.title: 纽约联储称，美国消费者预期通胀上升、经济改善
item.description: 纽约联邦储备委员会周一发布报告称，美国消费者上个月对未来几年通胀水平的上升做好了准备，尽管他们对个人财务状况将明显改善的预期有所提高。【原文：U.S. consumers were bracing last month for higher levels of inflation in coming years even as they marked up expectations that their personal financial situations would improve markedly, the New York Federal Reserve reported on Monday.】

item.title: 谷歌称已利用新芯片破解量子计算难题
item.description: 谷歌周一表示，它利用新一代芯片攻克了量子计算的一个关键难题，在五分钟内解决了一个经典计算机需要比宇宙历史还长的时间才能解决的计算问题。【原文：Google on Monday said that it has overcome a key challenge in quantum computing with a new generation of chip, solving a computing problem in five minutes that would take a classical computer more time than the history of the universe.】

item.title: Reddit 测试人工智能功能，回答用户询问
item.description: Reddit 周一表示，它正在测试一项名为 "Reddit Answers "的人工智能功能，该功能可以搜索社交媒体平台上的帖子，回答用户的询问。【原文：Reddit is testing an AI-powered feature called Reddit Answers, which scours posts on the social media platform to answer users' queries, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 10 月份批发库存小幅反弹
item.description: 由于长期制成品库存小幅上升，10 月份美国批发库存温和反弹。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories rebounded moderately in October amid a small rise in stocks of long-lasting manufactured goods.】

item.title: 股东批准拆分 Bollore 的维旺迪传媒集团
item.description: 法国媒体集团维旺迪（Vivendi）的股东周一批准了由博洛雷（Bollore）家族支持的分拆计划，旨在分拆Canal+、Havas和路易-哈歇特集团，尽管市场上存在一些怀疑，少数股东也表示反对。【原文：Shareholders of French media conglomerate Vivendi approved on Monday the breakup backed by the Bollore family, aiming to spin off Canal+, Havas and Louis Hachette Group despite some market scepticism and opposition from minority shareholders.】

item.title: 康卡斯特预计第四季度宽带用户流失将超过 10 万
item.description: 康卡斯特有线电视公司总裁兼首席执行官戴夫-沃森（Dave Watson）周一在瑞银全球媒体与通信会议上表示，康卡斯特预计第四季度宽带用户的流失量将略高于 10 万。【原文：Comcast expects broadband subscriber losses to be a little over 100,000 in the fourth quarter, said Dave Watson, president and CEO of Comcast Cable at the UBS Global Media and Communications conference on Monday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，吉百利所有者 Mondelez 正在探索收购好时公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一援引熟知内情的人士的话报道，吉百利的母公司蒙代尔兹国际公司（Mondelez International）正在探讨收购巧克力生产商好时公司（Hershey），这将使该公司成为世界上最大的糖果生产商之一。【原文：Cadbury-parent Mondelez International is exploring the acquisition of chocolate maker Hershey , Bloomberg News reported on Monday, citing people familiar with the matter, in what would create one of the world's largest confectioner.】

item.title: 字节跳动和 TikTok 寻求在最高法院审查前暂时停止美国的镇压法
item.description: 总部位于中国的字节跳动及其短视频应用 TikTok 周一请求上诉法院暂时阻止一项法律，该法律要求母公司字节跳动在 1 月 19 日前剥离 TikTok，否则将面临禁令，等待美国最高法院的审查。【原文：Chinese-based ByteDance and its short video app TikTok on Monday asked an appeals court to temporarily block a law that would require that parent company ByteDance divest TikTok by Jan. 19 or face a ban pending a review by the U.S. Supreme Court.】

item.title: 联合利华首席财务官在运营改革中承担更多责任
item.description: 联合利华周一表示，首席财务官费尔南多-费尔南德斯（Fernando Fernandez）将承担更多职责，包括监督供应链和采购，因为公司正在全面改革运营，以专注于 "强势 "品牌。【原文：Unilever said on Monday CFO Fernando Fernandez would take on more responsibilities, including overseeing supply chain and procurement, as the company overhauls its operations to focus on its "power" brands.】

item.title: 康卡斯特与华纳兄弟探索频道达成多年发行协议
item.description: 华纳兄弟 Discovery 公司周一表示，该公司与康卡斯特公司签署了一项多年协议，将通过康卡斯特的线性电视、应用程序和流媒体服务向英国和爱尔兰的 Xfinity 和 Sky 用户分发其内容。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery signed a multi-year deal with Comcast to distribute its content to Xfinity and Sky UK and Ireland customers using Comcast's linear television, apps, and streaming services, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 中国小米宣布推出全新 SUV
item.description: 中国小米公司周一表示，预计将于明年 6 月或 7 月推出一款全新 SUV--YU7。【原文：China's Xiaomi said on Monday that it expects to launch a new SUV, the YU7, in June or July next year.】

item.title: 陶氏将以 24 亿美元出售美国墨西哥湾沿岸部分基础设施资产的 40% 股份
item.description: 陶氏公司周一表示，将以 24 亿美元的价格向麦格理资产管理公司（Macquarie Asset Management）管理的一家基金出售美国墨西哥湾沿岸部分基础设施资产 40% 的股份，以更加专注于核心化工业务。【原文：Dow said on Monday it would sell a 40% stake in some U.S. Gulf Coast infrastructure assets to a fund managed by Macquarie Asset Management for $2.4 billion as it looks to focus more on its core chemicals business.】

item.title: 前太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）工程师寻求帮助结束美国缺乏特种铀燃料的局面
item.description: 前太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）工程师斯科特-诺兰（Scott Nolan）是初创公司 General Matter 的首席执行官，他的使命是在美国以商业规模生产一种浓缩核燃料并降低其成本，从而帮助俄罗斯结束对这种燃料的垄断。【原文：Former SpaceX engineer Scott Nolan, CEO of startup General Matter, is on a mission to help end Russia's monopoly on a type of more-enriched nuclear fuel by producing it at commercial scale in the United States and slashing its costs.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）结束对软件更新后的 7745 辆菲斯科 Ocean SUV 的初步调查
item.description: 美国汽车安全监管机构周一表示，已经结束了对 7745 辆菲斯科 Ocean SUV 未能挂入驻车档的初步评估，此前这家电动汽车初创公司发布了召回公告，并发布了软件更新。【原文：The U.S. auto safety regulator said on Monday it has closed a preliminary evaluation into 7,745 Fisker Ocean SUVs over failure to shift vehicles into the park gear, after the electric-vehicle startup issued recalls and released a software update.】

item.title: 中国对英伟达涉嫌违反反垄断法进行调查
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周一表示，已就英伟达涉嫌违反中国反垄断法展开调查。【原文：China's market regulator has opened an investigation into Nvidia over suspected violation of the country's antimonopoly law, the regulator said on Monday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者巴林顿资本敦促梅西百货削减开支
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周一报道，激进投资者巴林顿资本（Barington Capital）已在梅西百货建仓，并敦促这家连锁百货公司削减开支，考虑在公司内部分离出一个房地产部门。【原文：Activist investor Barington Capital has built a position in Macy's and is urging the department store chain to cut spending and consider the separation of a real-estate unit within the company, the Wall Street Journal reported on Monday.】

item.title: 投资者关注通胀数据，期货价格持稳
item.description: 周一，美国股指期货表现低迷，上一交易日 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数因乐观的企业业绩预期而创下收盘新高，而投资者则在等待本周晚些时候将公布的一份关键的通胀报告。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were subdued on Monday after the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq notched record closing highs in the previous session on upbeat corporate forecasts, while investors awaited a key inflation report due later in the week.】

item.title: Arthur J. Gallagher 将以 134.5 亿美元收购 AssuredPartners
item.description: Arthur J. Gallagher 周一表示，该公司已同意以 134.5 亿美元的价格收购保险经纪公司 AssuredPartners，以加强其在庞大且快速增长的中端市场的业务。【原文：Arthur J. Gallagher said on Monday it has agreed to acquire insurance broker AssuredPartners in a $13.45 billion deal, as it looks to bolster its presence in the vast and fast-growing middle-market segment.】

item.title: 台积电创始人：英特尔本应专注于人工智能而非芯片制造
item.description: 台湾半导体制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Intel should have focused on artificial intelligence rather than trying to become a contract chipmaker, the founder of Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co said on Monday, in relation to the recent departure of Intel's CEO.】

item.title: 美联储减息预期升温，中国转变货币政策立场
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国法官权衡洋葱收购 Infowars 的命运
item.description: 阴谋论者亚历克斯-琼斯（Alex Jones）将于周一在休斯敦举行的法庭听证会上敦促美国破产法官阻止将其 Infowars 网站出售给 Onion 新闻模仿网站。【原文：Conspiracy theorist Alex Jones is set to urge a U.S. bankruptcy judge to block the sale of his Infowars website to the Onion news parody site at a Monday court hearing in Houston.】

item.title: 美国人面临医疗保险成本上升和延误增多的挑战
item.description: 珍-沃森（Jen Watson）是华盛顿州联邦路市一位 41 岁的母亲，多年来她一直与医生合作，寻找合适的药物来治疗她的多种慢性疾病，其中包括癫痫和纤维肌痛。【原文：Jen Watson, a 41-year-old mother in Federal Way, Washington, has worked for years with her doctor to find the right medications to deal with her multiple chronic illnesses, which include epilepsy and fibromyalgia.】

item.title: 特朗普领导的马斯克提高效率运动或将促进国防科技合作
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）计划推动美国政府提高效率，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）参与其中，根据对公司高管的采访，大型国防承包商和小型科技公司可能会在人工智能、无人机和无人驾驶潜艇等领域开展更多联合项目。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's planned U.S. government efficiency drive involving Elon Musk could lead to more joint projects between big defense contractors and smaller tech firms in areas such as artificial intelligence, drones and uncrewed submarines, according to interviews with company executives.】

item.title: 大众汽车公司表示，工会必须为德国工厂找到新的解决方案
item.description: 大众汽车公司首席谈判代表阿尔内-迈斯温克尔（Arne Meiswinkel）周一表示，在公司拒绝了工会提出的难以为继的建议后，工会和管理层需要为德国工厂找到其他解决方案。【原文：Volkswagen's chief negotiator Arne Meiswinkel said on Monday that unions and management needed to find alternative pathways to a solution for its German plants after the company rejected a proposal put forward by unions as unsustainable.】
